empathie.title: Empathy
empathie.content: Through my personality, the interpersonal relationships that I have developed as well as the readings that I have done, I have revealed a strong empathy that allows me to communicate with my interlocutor in a benevolent way in order to seek to better understand him.

equipe.title: Team spirit
equipe.content: With experience in catering, more particularly as a team leader in fast food, I learned to develop group cohesion in order to deal with stressful situations.

pedagogie.title: Pedagogy
pedagogie.content: Graduated with a Master's degree in Education and Training Sciences, I was able to develop my knowledge and skills in pedagogy and andragogy and was able to use them during courses that I taught at the University.

autonomie.title: Autonomy
autonomie.content: Beyond my professional experiences, during my studies, I was able to learn how to structure myself, set goals and achieve them independently.

adaptation.title: Adaptation
adaptation.content: As evidenced by my CV, I am a person who can touch on many areas and I know how to adapt to people as well as to the professional demands that are made to me. I also learned to search on my own when my skills and knowledge reached their limit.
